title: Fizz's Eyeballs [Gameplay]
body: Fizz has had this bug basically since he has been released. If you walk into a bush as fizz your eyeballs pop out and look really disturbing i don't know if this is intentional but it has remained in the game for ever. I feel like i'm the only one to notice this and i hope that it isn't intentional cause i will feel dumb.

replies.body: ay i forgot about this post but thanks for the  feedback i finally got an answer :D {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Yeah this brush bug has existed for a while, at the very least since Camille was released, you could see the cylinders that protrude during her hookshot in the brush without using hookshot
